title: Manage Mooring Gang Operations
description: A vessel is arriving. The mooring gang supervisor must direct the linesmen to safely secure the vessel.

tasks.description: Receive the vessel's mooring plan, showing the number and arrangement of mooring lines.
tasks.expected_outcome: Supervisor reviews the plan which specifies 8 mooring lines.

tasks.description: Position the linesmen at the correct bollards on the quay as the vessel approaches.
tasks.expected_outcome: The crew is correctly positioned to catch the heaving lines from the ship.

tasks.description: Direct the team to secure the mooring lines in the correct sequence and confirm to the pilot when the vessel is 'all fast'.
tasks.expected_outcome: All lines are secured, and the supervisor radios 'all fast' to the vessel's pilot.
